mapper.select: SELECT building.`building_id` as id,building.`building_num` as buildingNum FROM building LEFT JOIN AREA ON(area.`area_id`=building.`area_id`) WHERE area.`area_name`=#{areaName}

SELECT building.`area_id`,building.`building_id`,building.`building_num`,building.`sex`,area.`area_id`,area.`area_name` FROM building LEFT JOIN AREA ON(area.`area_id` = building.`area_id`) WHERE building.`sex`=#{sex} ORDER BY area.`area_id`

SELECT COUNT(student.`stu_id`) FROM student RIGHT JOIN (SELECT room_id,room.`total_bed` FROM room LEFT JOIN FLOOR ON(room.`floor_id`=floor.`floor_id` )WHERE floor.`building_id`=#{buildingId}) u ON(u.room_id = student.`room_id`)
SELECT SUM(room.`total_bed`) FROM room LEFT JOIN FLOOR ON(room.`floor_id`=floor.`floor_id` )WHERE floor.`building_id`=#{buildingId}
mapper.update: update building set sex=#{sex} where building_num=#{buildingNum}
